alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin; Central Colorado River Basin; Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Central Yampa River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor; Four Corners, Upper Dolores River; Lower Yampa River Basin; Paradox Valley, Lower Dolores River; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus; San Juan River Basin; Upper Gunnison River Valley; Upper Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 11 at 2:02PM MDT until April 12 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph. Expect gusts up to 55 mph in the valleys and up to 65 mph in the mountains. * WHERE...Portions of east central and southeast Utah and northwest, southwest and west central Colorado. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.
